Title: Sivas
Actors: Okan Avci, Cakir, Ezgi Ergin, Banu Fotocan
Plot: 11-year-old Aslan saves an injured Kangal sheepdog named Sivas, a fighting dog that was left for dead after losing a brutal match. He then tries to use Sivas to impress his classmates, in particular the girl he likes, and even sets up an amateur fight with another boy's dog.
